name: mdast
description: Speedy Markdown parser for multipurpose analysis
author: Christopher Jeffrey

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports spec/mdast.spec.js
scripts.lint: npm run-script lint-api && npm run-script lint-test && npm run-script lint-benchmark && npm run-script lint-style
scripts.lint-api: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js lib/parse/index.js lib/stringify/index.js --env node --env browser --rule 'quotes: [2, single]'
scripts.lint-test: node_modules/.bin/eslint spec/mdast.spec.js spec/fixtures.js --env node --env mocha --rule 'quotes: [2, single]'
scripts.lint-style: node_modules/.bin/jscs index.js lib/parse/index.js lib/stringify/index.js spec/mdast.spec.js spec/fixtures.js benchmark/index.js --reporter=inline
scripts.make: npm run-script lint && npm run-script coverage
